#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long int ll;
ll diff,capacity;

void findsum(ll space[], int start, int n, ll sum)
{
	if(start==n)
	{
	//	cout<<"here "<<sum<<endl;
		if(sum<=capacity && (capacity-sum)<diff)
		  diff=capacity-sum;
		
		return;
	}
	
	findsum(space,start+1,n,sum);
	findsum(space,start+1,n,sum+space[start]);
}

int main()
{
	int n,i,test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--){
	cin>>n>>capacity;
	diff=capacity;
	ll space[n+1];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	 cin>>space[i];
	
    findsum(space,0,n,0);
	cout<<diff<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
